Name: androiddebugbridge
Overview: Control AndroidTV/FireTV devices through ADB from the Home Assistant Core docker image.

bootwaittime.Name: Boot Wait Time
bootwaittime.Description: Length of time in seconds to wait after the container has started before attempting to connect to devices.

devicelist.Name: Device List
devicelist.Description: Comma separated list of androidtv/firetv devices to connect to, each one listed as [ip/hostname]:[port],[ip/hostname]:[port].

checkfrequency.Name: Check Frequency
checkfrequency.Description: Length of time in seconds to wait between successive attempts to connect (or re-connect) to devices.
